ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG of Toronto, Ontario, as auditor of Canada Lands Company Limited for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2008; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of Canada Lands Company Limited for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2008.
